name: Basil Broth
keywords: basil, leek, root vegetables, dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 pound celery root, peeled and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Put all ingredients but the basil in a large pot over medium heat and simmer 1 1/2 hours. Strain, and discard the vegetables. Return the broth to a pan over medium heat and continue cooking until it cooks down to 1 quart.
Remove from heat, add the basil to the broth and steep 1 minute. Strain. Discard the basil. In a well-covered container in the refrigerator, the broth will keep for up to 5 days.
